detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder blouse in soft viscose jersey with decorative buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and elastication at the top and cuffs.

Oversized shirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen, notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Calf-length, A-line skirt with a high waist and a concealed zip and button at the back. Unlined.
Straight-cut mesh top with short sleeves.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a patch pocket at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch imitation leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Cotton chinos with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button, and slim legs.
Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and elasticated hems.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Leggings in ribbed, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace balconette bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with lace at the top, a boat neck, short cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with a pleated skirt. Satin lining at the top with side support and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and decorative drawstring with a sewn-on bow at the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently rounded hem.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Double-layered jersey hairband with a knot-detail at the front.
Trousers in a softly draping viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with an unlined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with appliqués at the top and a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Small ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a zip down the front, hood with embroidered details and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a brushed finish, with front and back pockets and skinny legs with seams and raw, frayed details at the knees.

Fancy dress costume in glossy velour with a glitter print on the front. Dress with a seam at the waist and a lined tulle skirt with an asymmetric hem. Detachable cape in tulle with shimmering print and a hook and loop fastener at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with fold-down shafts. One pair containing glittery threads and the other with a frill trim in mesh and lace.
Spacious shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Soft brushed inside. Size 16x31x39 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short parka with a faux shearling-lined hood, high collar with a tab and press-stud and a concealed zip down the front. Handwarmer pockets at the top and patch front pockets with a flap, hook and loop fastening and an opening at the sides. Sleeves with a tab and press-stud at the cuffs, one sleeve with a pocket that has a flap and hook and loop fastening. Drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, wide elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Ankle-length pull on-trousers in a viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and an embroidered pattern on the front.
Cropped bandeau top in a patterned weave with a silicone trim at the top and wide smocking at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a decorative tie detail at the front.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and picot trims.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, and lace trims at the hems.
Blucher shoes in shiny leather with lacing at the top and gently rounded toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a rounded collar, decorative pleats and buttons down the front. Gathered yoke at the back and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Short dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with pin-tucks and frills at the top and an elasticated seam with ties under the bust. Unlined.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish and fringes. Size 55x210 cm.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit bodice, motif on the front, gathered seam at the hips and gently flared, patterned skirt.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.

Long dress in airy georgette made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a tiered skirt for added volume and soft draping. Lined in chiffon made from recycled polyester.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sleeveless top in a gently draping viscose weave with short, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
5-pocket jeans in soft stretch denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and tapered legs.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Lightly padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and concealed side pockets. Lined.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a small appliqué at the top. Contrasting colour jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Straight-cut top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, ribbed collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey with a boat neck and gently rounded hem.
Puff pants in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the waist and hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Flared calf-length skirt in lace with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Oversized, knee-length top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and gathered ribbing at the cuffs. Decorative embroidery at the front and a kangaroo pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved shirt in premium cotton with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Wide jersey top in a soft, stripe-print cotton and modal blend with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey covered elastication at the waist and hole embroidery at the hems.
Rectangular hair clips in metal and acetate. Length approx. 6.5 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
A pair of long metal earrings with hoops and rod-shaped pendants. Length 6.5 cm.
Short one-shoulder dress in stretch jersey with long raglan sleeves and an elasticated, gathered seam at the waist.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Wrap dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, concealed press-stud at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle boots in suede with a zip at one side and tabs with metal buckles at the other. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.

Reversible, lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a hood, zip down the front and side pockets. One patterned side and one side in a solid colour. The patterned side has a zipped chest pocket in a contrasting colour that acts as an inner pocket when the jacket is reversed.
One-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Narrow strap over one shoulder and a wide, embroidered flounce over the other shoulder.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and long sleeves.
